sentences.sContent: The moral of this article is that a little forethought can pay off tremendously.
sentences.sContent_eng: The moral of this article is that a little forethought can pay off tremendously.
sentences.sCn: 本文给我们的启示是：一点点深谋远虑可以带来极大的回报。

synos.tran: 深谋远虑；先见；考虑将来

words.tran: 深谋远虑的；有先见之明的

trans.tranCn: 深谋远虑；先见；考虑将来
